subtitle: Homemade mushroom ketchup tastes so good especially with a traditional breakfast. This recipe should keep for 3 months.

method.text: Break mushrooms into small pieces and put into a large bowl. Sprinkle salt over mushrooms. Cover and leave overnight.

The next day, drain off salty liquid. Transfer mushrooms to stainless steel or enamel pan. Crush pepper corns and allspice and add to mushrooms with grated ginger and vinegar. Bring to boil and simmer, uncovered, for 30 min. Cool.

Blend until smooth. Pour into hot sterilised jars and seal. Place jars in deep saucepan with simmering water to level of neck of each jar. Keep water at simmering point for 30 min. Remove jars from water. Cool.
Check seals are tight. Label and store in cool place for at least a week before opening.

title: Mushroom ketchup
